title: I need 53 rp WILL A KIND SOUL HELP ME
body: I really, really want that Illaoi bundle because its the only decent thing I want right now. I have 1462  rp thought it was 1350 rp per bundle

replies.body: Riot might if you send them a ticket and a GOOD poem or essay saying why you want/need the 53 rp
They'll usually accept fan art too, but for the most part they do this for a <10 RP so they may not do it for 53.
